sentences.sentence: This in turn reduced prices and enabled the PC to democratise computing.
sentences.translation: 而这种可能又降低了电脑的价格使其得以普及。

sentences.sentence: Schiller argues the credit crisis merely shows that much more work needs to be done to democratise finance.
sentences.translation: 席勒认为，信贷危机仅仅说明让金融实现大众化需要做的工作还有很多。
